name: Mofongo Boy
description:
Mofongo is a very famous meal in puerto rico made with green plantain.

In this fabulous platform game you are a mofongo and your duty is to collect green plantain and destroy enemies, they have to jump on the heads of the enemies or face them! Holding down the jump button (up arrow on the right side of the screen), you can jump higher and you can also approach with the down arrow on the left side of the screen. You have to finish each level in 30 seconds and the remaining seconds are considered for the next level. You also have 3 lives by default and you can earn more lives by collectin green plantaing . Every 30 green plantain will earn you an extra that can be very useful in later levels! This game has 10 levels in total and will become much more difficult as you progress,have fun!
